full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BDAG PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM SGRIL GYI SGRUB THABS RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM SGRIL GYI SGRUB THABS RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI @009A *, ,AOR DU SU PE'I LE DON GRUB RGYA MTSO'I BLA MAR GRO MI SMAD RGYUD RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS 'BYOR GYIS BKUL MA BYUNG BA DANG, DON GNYER CAN GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PAR BSAM NAS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
